name: Penguin Travel: Slide!
description:
Game Features:
-Vairous of maps with different sightviews.
-Collect items to fullfill you packbag and earn coins.
-Move forward and let's reach the final!
-Save your best friend - Mr. Octopus！For friendship forever.
-Pay attention to the items you encounter, they are valuable.

Come to join us with these cute Penguins.

And if you have any suggestions, plz contact us with this email: thysshauntelle87995@gmail.com
